summary: Physician Vitalis O. Ojiegbe, M.D., had his medical license permanently revoked for professional incompetence, fraudulent license use, and prescribing controlled dangerous substances for illegitimate purposes. He was found to have issued high-dose opioids without proper medical justification or monitoring, ignored signs of patient non-compliance and diversion, and falsely represented his board certification status. These actions constituted severe violations of the Maryland Medical Practice Act.
